info.description:
[//]: # (The content of this file is used as the descrption of the API)

# Scope of this API

This API can be used to integrate Magicline operations into third party clients like websites or apps.

Following operations are supported

* Online contract conclusion
* Trial session slot booking
* Lead creation
info.title: Magicline Connect API

tags.description: Allow prospects to book a trial session
tags.name: TrialSessions

tags.description: Additional referral information for member creation
tags.name: Referral

tags.description: Getting information about external promotion participation
tags.name: Promotions

tags.description: List rates and create new members
tags.name: Contracts

tags.description: Store credit cards for new members
tags.name: CreditCard Tokenization

post.summary: Redeem a ContractVoucher. Only Vouchers of type 'Rate' are supported here.

get.summary: Validates a ContractVoucher and returns basic voucher information to display. Only Vouchers of type 'Rate' are supported here.

parameters.description: Tokenization reference you'll get via initiate endpoint
parameters.name: tokenizationReference

get.summary: Lists all active features of the organization unit
Returns a list of tuples with every available country code and the localized country name
Returns information about an existing lead record

parameters.description: The Id of the studio to fetch the rate bundles from
parameters.name: studioId

post.summary: Create a new customer and a new contract

get.description: Get the studio's default communication settings. The returned list contains an entry for each existing message category.
get.summary: Get the studio's default communication settings.

parameters.description: Language to pick the right translation (IETF BCP 47 language tags)
parameters.name: language

get.description: Return information about the utilization of this studio. Needs to be enabled for public view in the configuration.
Returns free slots for a studio where a trial session appointment can be booked.
get.summary: Get free slots for a trial session

post.description: Book a free slot. Might return errorCode CONFLICT if configured resources are overbooked for this slot. In this case its advised to reload free slots and let the user select a different slot. If you get a validation error make sure all required fields are filled. Required fields are returned by the `/config/validation` endpoint.

get.description: Returns the configuration which needs to be considered e.g. for form fields and their validation.

post.description: For some countries additional customer related attributes might be needed for that. Country will be derived from given studioId.
post.summary: Validates the taxId against country based validation rules.

200.description: Get payment methods, the contained paymentMethodsJson must be deserialized and passed to the Adyen web component

parameters.description: Tokenization reference you'll get via initiate endpoint
parameters.name: tokenizationReference

get.description: You can add optional filters. Parameters addressSearchQuery and studioTags are combined by AND

parameters.description: Filter by identifier of StudioTag (german wording: Standort Code). Dynamic attribute configured at studio (e.g for Brands or Locations). Multiple Tags are combined by OR.
parameters.name: studioTags

parameters.description: Search prefix for zipCode or city of studio address.
parameters.name: addressSearchQuery

get.summary: Fetch detail information for one studio
Fetch enabled communication feature modules for one studio
Fetch legal information for one studio

action.description: Action object by Adyen (serialized to Json string). If this is not 'null' pass it to the Adyen web component

reference.description: Reference for tokenization process, use it in further requests

resultCode.description: Result code by payment provider, usually 'IdentifyShopper' or 'RedirectShopper', then 'action' needs to be passed to Adyen component. Display generic error message when this is 'Error'. For a complete list see: https://docs.adyen.com/online-payments/payment-result-codes

communicationPreferences.description: Communication preferences for the customer. If specified, the list must contain an element for each message category.

customerUUID.description: Should only be set if booking page has been called with URL param identityToken. If no lead exists with this UUID a new one will be created.

privacyConfiguration.description: Data privacy configuration for marketing purposes

studioId.description: Only set if lead is fetched

errorMessage.description: Additional information if validation fails. Currently only for IT based IBANs

id.description: Id of current data block. See name field parameter or name of Dto!

bookingWithoutResourcesAllowed.description: true: Customer can decide if a trainer is needed, false: Trainer is always mandatory (trainerRequired)

description.description: Short description how the trial session looks like

birthInformationDto.description: Date, place and country of birth of customer

activeCommunicationChannels.description: The list of channels on which messages of the given category are allowed to be sent

messageCategoryId.description: The ID of the message category

optionalRateBundleTermModules.description: Selected optional rate bundle term modules additionally payable.

selectedRateBundleModules.description: Selected free inclusive rate bundle modules.

sepaSignature.description: if not set, the same value as in contractSignature is used

ageAdjustedPrice.description: The adjusted price, if age-based discounts are configured and the customer is eligible, null otherwise

companyAmount.description: Amount the company has to pay

companyAmountPreUseCharge.description: Amount the company has to pay for pre use charge

companyAmountWithoutDiscount.description: Amount the company has to pay without discount

companyFeeSplitType.description: Type of company fee split (percentage or absolute), if valid a company discount voucher is provided

companyFeeSplitValue.description: Company fee split value, if a valid company discount voucher is provided

companyName.description: Name of the company that will pay the company amount

contractVolumeInformation.description: Contains the total amount to be paid during the initial runtime of the contract and the average amounts per month and per the rate's payment frequency (e.g. 1 week)

creditValue.description: Voucher credit value, if a valid credit voucher is provided

discountType.description: Type of discount (percentage or absolute), if valid a (company) discount voucher is provided

discountValue.description: Discount value, if a valid (company) discount voucher is provided

discountedBasePrice.description: Discounted base price, if a valid (company) discount voucher is provided

discountedPreUseCharge.description: Discounted pre use charge, if a valid (company) discount voucher is provided

effectivePeriodTimeBasedTerm.description: Effective period: term in which a discount is applied if type is time base

effectivePeriodTimeBasedTermUnit.description: Effective period: term unit in which a discount is applied if type is time base

flatFeePreviews.description: Flat fee previews, including discount if a valid discount voucher is provided

memberAmount.description: Amount the member has to pay

memberAmountPreUseCharge.description: Amount the member has to pay for pre use charge

memberAmountWithoutDiscount.description: Amount the member has to pay without discount

moduleConsentTextBlocks.description: Consent texts for modules that are part of the contract

preUseCharge.description: Charge for the time between startdateofuse and startdate

selectedOptionalModulesPreviews.description: Optional module contract preview including discount, company split or credit, if a valid voucher is provided

voucherBonusPeriod.description: Bonus period applied with the (company) discount voucher, if valid a (company) discount voucher is provided

voucherEffectivePeriod.description: Effective period type in which a discount is applied

voucherErrorCode.description: An error code, if the voucher code is invalid

voucherErrorMessage.description: A readable, non-localized error message, if the voucher code is invalid

voucherRemarks.description: Voucher remarks, if a valid voucher code is provided

voucherSuccessMessage.description: Textual representation of the voucher conditions, if a valid voucher is provided

voucherTextBlocks.description: Voucher related text blocks, if a valid voucher is provided

voucherType.description: Type of a voucher, if a valid voucher code is provided

voucherCode.description: Only vouchers of type 'Credit' or 'Discount' are supported here.

id.description: Id of current data block. See name field parameter or name of Dto!

communicationPreferences.description: Communication preferences for the customer. If specified, the list must contain an element for each message category.

gender.description: User will be assigned as UNISEX if no gender is set.

locale.description: locale of customer as ISO 639-1 two-letter language and country code (e.g. es_ES or de_DE)

privacyConfiguration.description: Data privacy configuration for marketing purposes

province.description: addition for southern Europe/US countries (e.g. Madrid, California)

provinceCode.description: addition for US state abbreviation (e.g. CA)

id.description: Id of current data block. See name field parameter or name of Dto!

uuid.description: Can be used to execute follow up actions (Booking of appointment, singing a contract with this exact customer.

bankAccount.description: Required in combination with paymentChoice DIRECT_DEBIT

communicationPreferences.description: Communication preferences for the customer. If specified, the list must contain an element for each message category.

countryOfBirth.description: Required for italian studios and none-italian nationals

creditCard.description: Required in combination with paymentChoice CREDIT_CARD

dateOfBirth.description: The age must be between 0 and 100 years inclusive.

documentIdentification.description: information from an official document with identifies the customer

gender.description: User will be assigned as UNISEX if no gender is set.

identityToken.description: [Optional] Should only be set if checkout page has been called with URL param identityToken. If no customer exists with this UUID a new one will be created.

language.description: language of customer as ISO 639-1 two-letter code (e.g. es or de)

locale.description: locale of customer as ISO 639-1 two-letter language and country code (e.g. es_ES or de_DE)

paymentChoice.description: Only configured values in the rate bundle allowed. For Contract Voucher redemption use CASH

placeOfBirth.description: Required for italian studios and nationals

privacyConfiguration.description: Data privacy configuration for marketing purposes. Deprecated. Use communicationPreferences instead.

province.description: addition for southern Europe countries/US (e.g. Madrid, California)

referralCode.description: Referral code to link with recruiter

taxId.description: Required if the studio is located in Spain or Italy

telephone_mobile.description: If only one number is available use mobile as default.

telephone_private.description: If only one number is available use mobile as default.

url.description: Temporary valid download link. Expires after 5 hours

errorCodes.description: Generic categories of errors. You may map them to default responses

message.description: For developer integration and logging purposes. Do not show message in client!

spain_DNI_NIE.description: Required if the studio is located in Spain

browserInfo.description: Browser Info object, is obtained from Adyen card component and must be serialized to string

paymentMethod.description: Payment Method, is obtained from Adyen card component and must be serialized to string

returnUrl.description: Return url for redirects. If user is redirected to banking page, he will be redirected to this url after authentication.

ageBasedAdjustmentDtos.description: Age-based price adjustments. Price adjustments can be either a percentage by which the base price is being discounted or an absolute price.

money.description: The price for this payment frequency. Only set if "type" is either "RECURRING" or "NON_RECURRING"

monthDayWithPrices.description: The dates and respective prices on which payments are due. Only set if "type" is "MONTH_DAY"

recurring.description: Whether the cycle of payments repeats indefinitely. Only relevant if type is "TERM_BASED" or "MONTH_DAY".

term.description: The interval in which payments are made. Only set if "type" is "RECURRING"

termWithPrices.description: The terms and respective prices after which payments are due. Only set if "type" is "TERM_BASED"

type.description: The kind of intervals in which payments are made

allowedPaymentChoices.description: Allowed payment types for this rate bundle. Others than in this list will not be accepted when creating a contract. Please note: The Connect API only supports 'DIRECT_DEBIT' and 'CREDIT_CARD'. Therefore, this list will contain these two values at most.

contractSignaturesRequired.description: Indicates if a digital signature for the contract (and SEPA agreement) is mandatory.

contractTextBlocks.description: Important contract details such as privacy details or special conditions. Show them to the customer before contract acceptance

footnote.description: Contractual or legal comments to be displayed below the offer.

id.description: Id of current data block. See name field parameter or name of Dto!

imageUrl.description: Temporary valid download link for rate bundle image. Expires after 24h

initialPaymentRequired.description: An initial payment has to be made in order to gain access to the studio. An email will be sent to the user after contract creation with details how to make the payment.

limitedOfferingPeriod.description: The period in which this rate bundle is offered

maximumNumberOfSelectableModules.description: The maximum value of the selectable modules that the customer can choose.

onlinePaymentType.description: Under development: Indicates if this RateBundle has some kind of special Payment Handling

selectableModules.description: Selectable free inclusive modules. Customer is only allowed to choose a fixed value of them. The maximum value of the selected modules describes `maximumNumberOfSelectableModules` property.

id.description: Id of current data block. See name field parameter or name of Dto!

paymentFrequencyUnit.description: is set in combination with RECURRING type

paymentFrequencyValue.description: is set in combination with RECURRING type

ageBasedAdjustmentDtos.description: A list of age-based price adjustments for this term. Deprecated, use "paymentFrequencyDto.ageBasedAdjustmentDtos" instead.

contractStartDateOfUse.description: This contract start date of use will be used if none will be send, but can be overridden

contractVolumeInformation.description: Contains the total amount to be paid during the initial runtime of the contract and the average amounts per month and per the rate's payment frequency (e.g. 1 week)

defaultContractStartDate.description: This contract start will be used if none will be send, but can be overridden

id.description: Id of current data block. See name field parameter or name of Dto!

paymentFrequencyDto.description: The payment frequency of this term

paymentFrequencyUnit.description: Is set in combination with RECURRING type. Deprecated, use "paymentFrequencyDto.term.termUnit" instead.

paymentFrequencyValue.description: Is set in combination with RECURRING type. Deprecated, use "paymentFrequencyDto.term.term" instead.

priceAdjustmentRules.description: A list of price adjustment rules which applies to this term. Like a 5% raise every 6 months

priceAfterExtension.description: The new price after minimum contract duration. Null if not configured.

rateStartPrice.description: price for the first period of the contract, if the term has bonus period at the beginning of the contract then it is equal to 0, otherwise is equal to term price.

termUnitAfterExtension.description: The new term unit after minimum contract duration. Null if not configured.

termValueAfterExtension.description: The new term value after minimum contract duration. Null if not configured.

paymentFrequency.description: Additional details of payment frequency. Deprecated, formatting should be handled on the client side using information from "paymentFrequencyDto"

paymentFrequencyUnit.description: Is set in combination with RECURRING type. Deprecated, use "paymentFrequencyDto.term.termUnit" instead.

paymentFrequencyValue.description: Is set in combination with RECURRING type. Deprecated, use "paymentFrequencyDto.term.term" instead.

id.description: Id of current data block. See name field parameter or name of Dto!

attachedDocument.description: Optional contract document attachment You should display a download link if this field is set.

attachedExternalUrlDto.description: Optional link to external url You should display a link if this field is set with the given title and target url

attachmentType.description: Indicates the type of attachment for this block: None, file (attachedDocument) or Url (attachedExternalUrlDto)

hasSignature.description: text block configuration has a signature field. You have the option to show a signature input field and it will be added in the contract document. It is not a required field in magicline. It is up to your implementation if you add this field.

isConfirmationRequired.description: text block configuration contains a confirmation. You are advised to show a check box (or signature if hasSignature=true) in combination with this text block where the user should give his consent.

rateBundleModuleId.description: The ID of the associated rate bundle module. Only set if this is a module consent text block.

showCommunicationPrivacyOptions.description: text block contains information about the communication privacy options You are advised to show a matrix with communication settings in combination with this text block.

province.description: addition for southern Europe/US countries (e.g. Madrid, California)

provinceCode.description: addition for US (e.g. CA for California)

communicationChannels.description: A list containing all channels. Each channel contains information on whether it is active and / or customer overridable.

centralLegalLinks.description: Legal Links configured on the Operating Company currently active on the Studio

closingDate.description: Studio is either fully closed, or temporarily closed from this date on. It is up to the studio owner to decide how to interpret this value on his website.

hasRateBundles.description: Does this studio has contract offers for online sign up

id.description: Id of current data block. See name field parameter or name of Dto!

openingDate.description: If this value is set, inform the customer about a delayed contract start. Send start date with min value of openingDate!

openingHours.description: List of day ranges with openingHours, dayOfWeek 1 = MONDAY, dayOfWeek 7 = SUNDAY. Might be one range 1 - 7 if openingHours does not differ from day to day or multiple ranges like 1-5 and 6-7 if the studio has different opening hours on week days and weekends.

referralProgramActive.description: Whether the studio has an active referral program configuration

trialSessionBookable.description: Has this studio trial session configured for online booking of slots

trialSessionHours.description: List of day range and timeframe where trial session can be booked, dayOfWeek 1 = MONDAY, dayOfWeek 7 = SUNDAY.Might be one range 1 - 7 if trialSessionHours does not differ from day to day or multiple ranges like 1-5 and 6-7 if the studio has different trialSessionHours on week days and weekends.

trialSessionName.description: Name of the trial session benefit which you can book appointments for

closingDate.description: Studio is either fully closed, or temporarily closed from this date on. It is up to the studio owner to decide how to interpret this value on his website.

hasRateBundles.description: Does this studio has contract offers for online sign up

id.description: Id of current data block. See name field parameter or name of Dto!

openingDate.description: If this value is set, inform the customer about a delayed contract start. Send start date with min value of openingDate!

openingHours.description: List of day ranges with openingHours, dayOfWeek 1 = MONDAY, dayOfWeek 7 = SUNDAY. Might be one range 1 - 7 if  openingHours does not differ from day to day or multiple ranges like 1-5 and 6-7 if the studio has different opening hours on week days and weekends.

trialSessionBookable.description: Has this studio trial session configured for online booking of slots

trialSessionName.description: Name of the trial session benefit which you can book appointments for

countryOfBirth.description: addition for Italy if customer isn't national

gender.description: User will be assigned as UNISEX if no gender is set.

placeOfBirth.description: addition for Italy if customer is national

studioId.description: Is needed to determine country specific validation rules

taxId.description: Is country specific, like CodiceFisacale in Italy

id.description: Id of current data block. See name field parameter or name of Dto!

uuid.description: Can be used to execute follow up actions (Booking of appointment, singing a contract with this exact customer.

addressMode.description: Defines validation mode for full address. INACTIVE: hide it, OPTIONAL: Show it as optional form field, MANDATORY: Show it as mandatory form field.

dateOfBirthMode.description: Defines validation mode for birthdate. INACTIVE: hide it, OPTIONAL: Show it as optional form field, MANDATORY: Show it as mandatory form field.

emailMode.description: Defines validation mode for email address. INACTIVE: hide it, OPTIONAL: Show it as optional form field, MANDATORY: Show it as mandatory form field.

genderMode.description: Defines validation mode for gender. INACTIVE: hide it, OPTIONAL: Show it as optional form field, MANDATORY: Show it as mandatory form field.

minimumAge.description: minimum age to book a trial session (dateOfBirthMode is mandatory if value is set)

nameMode.description: Defines validation mode for full name. INACTIVE: hide it, OPTIONAL: Show it as optional form field, MANDATORY: Show it as mandatory form field.

placeOfBirthMode.description: Defines validation mode fro place of birth. INACTIVE: hide it, OPTIONAL: Show it as optional form field, MANDATORY: Show it as mandatory form field.

taxIdMode.description: Defines validation mode for tax id. INACTIVE: hide it, OPTIONAL: Show it as optional form field, MANDATORY: Show it as mandatory form field.

telephoneMode.description: Defines validation mode for telephone number. INACTIVE: hide it, OPTIONAL: Show it as optional form field, MANDATORY: Show it as mandatory form field.

zipMode.description: Defines validation mode for zip code. INACTIVE: hide it, OPTIONAL: Show it as optional form field, MANDATORY: Show it as mandatory form field.

paymentMethodsJson.description: Contains the Adyen payment methods, serialized to JSON.

bic.description: BIC will be auto-detected from IBAN if not given

accountPaymentInstrumentToken.description: This is the 'accountPaymentInstrumentToken' the user has received when he has configured his credit card. Use this if an existing credit card by Mysports is used.

tokenizationReference.description: This is the 'reference' you'll receive via /creditcard/tokenization/initiate endpoint. Use this if the customer adds a new credit card while contract signing.

textMessage.description: Marketing contact via text message allowed

base64Svg.description: If signature is set, you have to provide a valid svg value as base 64 string. Required format: data:image/svg+xml,... with or without prefix Check workflow documentation for more details.

textBlockId.description: If signature is part of a contract text block, set the corresponding id

chargeAdjustmentType.description: Type of the value: Percentage/absolute relative change or new absolute base amount

defaultDescription.description: A complete formatted sentence which contains all details about this price adjustment rule.If the presenation should differ use the separate attributes.

recurrenceFrequency.description: Recurrence of price adjustment rule, how often and when applies this rule

type.description: States if this rule is overall a RAISE or REDUCTION of the price

value.description: Value of price adjustment rule, might be percentage or amount, depends on chargeAdjustmentType

paymentInstrumentDto.description: The created payment instrument, only filled when tokenization completed

state.description: State of tokenization, on success this is 'COMPLETE'
